A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a pointless addition to this franchise. I felt like Abrams had it on the right track. This imbecile ruined it. Snoke dies before we even know who he is and by the idiotic spinning of a lightsaber? What was with all the stupid humor distractions? Luke dies simply because he used the force to project himself? Lukes entire character was horrible. Rey’s costume looked like it was meant for a toddler or she used her salary to support crispy cream. There were wholes throughout the plot.
